trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" />、<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)" /> 方法提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs> class also provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs>类还提供了数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A> method to draw a custom border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A>方法，以便绘制自定义边框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> 为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示待绘制区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is painted with.
trans-unit.target: 用来绘制 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 的背景的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to paint the specified bounds with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
trans-unit.target: 为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 类的新实例，并使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 绘制指定的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示待绘制区域的边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示待绘制区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A> method to draw a custom border around a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control.

trans-unit.target: 获取用来绘制 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 的背景的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripRenderer1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the overlap area between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 及其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" /> 之间的重叠区域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the overlap area between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 及其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem" /> 之间的重叠区域。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs.ConnectedArea%2A> property returns an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`null`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs.ConnectedArea%2A>属性返回一个空<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripRenderer1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderToolStripBackground?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.target: 获取用于绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。
